content.raw:
The following homebrew pull request was created for gazebo 7.6.0:

* https://github.com/osrf/homebrew-simulation/pull/222

with this jenkins job:

* http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/os_homebrew/job/generic-release-homebrew_pull_request_updater/138/console

and the console output claimed to trigger a new bottle build:

~~~
Triggering a new build of generic-release-homebrew_bottle_builder
Finished: SUCCESS
~~~

but there was no such job created:

* http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/generic-release-homebrew_bottle_builder/
content.html:
The following homebrew pull request was created for gazebo 7.6.0:

  • https://github.com/osrf/homebrew-simulation/pull/222

with this jenkins job:

  • http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/os_homebrew/job/generic-release-homebrew_pull_request_updater/138/console

and the console output claimed to trigger a new bottle build:

Triggering a new build of generic-release-homebrew_bottle_builder
Finished: SUCCESS

but there was no such job created:

  • http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/generic-release-homebrew_bottle_builder/
